channel.title: Posts on Nick Dong
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Nick Dong

item.title: Gluten
item.description: The idea is to use gluten as a building material for the desert. Dried gluten can defend against the wind, also used as an emergency food source for travellers.

item.title: Hugging Chair
item.description: The shape of people’s bodies when hugging inspires the idea of a hugging chair. When couples in long-distance relationships sit on the hugging chair, they can feel their partner is by their side. As you can see, the chair would not allow physical hugging.

item.title: Roller Coaster
item.description: This project was enlighted by the League of Legends map

item.title: Water Cycle
item.description: The experiment’s goal was to simulate the water cycle’s most basic operation, which is: Evaporation - Condensation - Water Vapour Transportation - Precipitation The round flask stands in for the earth, the candle for temperature, the middle for the atmosphere where water vapor is transported, and the top opening as clouds that would result in having precipitation. If you are interested in the animation process, please visit: Animation Process

item.title: Fan Building
item.description: The purpose of the “fan” structure is to provide a large opening in order to achieve the concept of a single entrance to multiple designations.
